Author: neelesh
Content:
The python implementation looks overly complicated. I was thinking that the ruby and python implementations would be very similar. Here it goes

def foo(n):

    return lambda i:n+i
Tried it (Python 2.5) and it works.

Author: apgwoz
Content: Slime doesn't exist for scheme. You can use Slime48 for Scheme48 version 1.3, but I don't know of any other ports for Scheme.
